thread.title: Kanye West is fed up with in-app purchases
thread.title_full: Kanye West is fed up with in-app purchases - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Kanye West is fed up with in-app purchases
text:
Parents of the world: Kanye West is just like you. He, too, hates games with in-app purchases.
Kanye might have seen a few unpleasant surprises on his credit card bill last night, as he took to Twitter air his grievances about free-to-play iOS games. It seems he and Kim Kardashian's two-year old daughter North likes paying to win.
Fuck any game company that puts in-app purchases on kids games!!!
— KANYE WEST (@kanyewest) October 10, 2015
That makes no sense!!! We give the iPad to our child and every 5 minutes there's a new purchase!!!
— KANYE WEST (@kanyewest) October 10, 2015
If a game is made for a 2 year old, just allow them to have fun and give the parents a break for Christ sake.
— KANYE WEST... »
